task_intent.title: 008-exercise-tracking-with-met-calculations
task_intent.description: Exercise logging with activity type selection, duration input, and automatic calorie burn calculation using MET (Metabolic Equivalent of Task) values. Track both cardio and strength training with appropriate calculations.

task_intent.title: 010-unified-daily-dashboard
task_intent.description: Central dashboard showing all daily health metrics: calorie balance (intake vs. TDEE), macro breakdown, exercise summary, sleep quality, and body composition status. Pre-calculated values from DailyLog for fast loading (<0.5s).
